rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language without high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a fact about cooking but lacks explicit calming language.
No bare negation or statement of absence/unlikelihood.
Describes a safeguard/prevention measure ('will also kill any viruses') without active reassurance.
